name: The Grisly Goblet (free entrance for Orcs)
games: Pot limit Omaha, deuce to seven Lowball.
free grog:: Only for the ones that reach the final table.
first prize: An entrance ticket to the course: how to put a spell on Elfs

name: Legolas Fixed Limit Cellar
free grog:: no, but there is live music and good service.
first prize: A unique travel opportunity to travel to the undying lands, a journey to Aman.

name: The Prancing Pony
free grog:: no, but there are complimentary snacks!
first prize: in this tournament the winner takes all! (minus 10 percent rake for the house and 5 percent cleaning expenses).

name: Smeagols Precious Inn
games: Strictly cashgames.. NO playing on credit!
buy-in:: games starting from 10 pieces of gold
free grog:: yes! all day long, as long as you play
first prize: It's a cashgame.. So when the money is gone, it's time to move on..

name: Saruman's Wizardly Poker Parlor
free grog:: Potions of unknown origin and snacks from Orthanc
first prize: A chance to be Saruman's apprentice (proceed with caution!)

name: Hobbiton Hold'em Haven
first prize: A year's supply of the finest Hobbit meals and a hobbit hole vacation

name: Elrond's Tranquil Poker Retreat
games: Elf Hold'em and Rivendell Stud Poker
first prize: 10.000 pieces of gold and an exclusive tour of Rivendell's beautiful gardens and libraries

name: Gondor's Royal Flush Casino
games: Gondorian Gilded Hold'em and Minas Tirith Five-Card Draw
free grog:: The finest wines of Gondor and gourmet cuisine
first prize: 25.000 pieces of gold and a tour of Minas Tirith, including the White Tree and the Hall of Kings
